author: J. J.
text:
Interested in starting a company in the US?
Firstbase provides thousands of founders with the tools they need to launch, manage, and grow their  businesses. You can seemlessly start your own business in the United States today.

Start here: 
https://t.co/oV645yx5ed

author: J. J.
text:
Firstbase provides thousands of founders with the tools they need to launch, manage, and grow their  businesses. You can seemlessly start your own business in the United States today.

Start here: 
https://t.co/oV645yx5ed

author: J. J.
text:
*Taking advantage of simplified bureaucracy compared to founders home country
*Accessing tax benefits available for foreign owned companies in the US
*Signing contracts with US based clients
*Tax benefits
*Splitting the ownership between co-founders

author: J. J.
text:
*Building trust with customers by doing business as a Us  incorporated company
*Accessing a specific platform or service (e.g Amazon)
*Pathway to immigration(01 or L1 Visas)
*Keeping money in a US FDIC insured bank account
*Opening a physical location/office in the US

author: J. J.
text:
Other reasons why foreign founders might want to form a legal entity in the US include
*Raising money from Venture Capitalists firms and/or angel investors
*Accessing essential tools for running a business, such as payment processors
*Applying for a US based start up accelerator

author: J. J.
text: Even though enterprises may be carried out without incorporation by an individual or partners, the main factors for choosing a corporate form is for the limited liability and the perpetual existence these organizations can offer.

author: J. J.
text:
How To Start A US Company:
The incorporation is the process to form a business entity in the United States. The founders will create a new entity to separate the liability from them as individuals. Protecting personal assets, and giving credibility to the enterprise.
